Think a social platform. Every KSP player will have an account(just like forum), we can add friends in that platform. And our creations goes to cloud, so we never lost our creations. If cloud thing will be success, maybe an iOS/Android app for make some creations. I know it's so complicated and crazy, but why not? Post your thoughts below.

It would be amazing to see a mobile platform vessel design app.

I would mostly be amazed to see that a mobile could hold over half a gigabyte of RAM.
